title: RAD-Seq Reference-based data analysis
questions: How to analyze RAD sequencing data using a reference genome for a population genomics study?
objectives: Analysis of RAD sequencing data using a reference genome
SNP calling from RAD sequencing data
Calculate population genomics statistics from RAD sequencing data

workflows.name: Workflow Constructed From History 'STACKS RAD: Population Genomics With Reference Genome'
workflows.title: Workflow Constructed From History 'STACKS RAD: Population Genomics With Reference Genome'

history.message: Move RAD-Seq tutorials to ecology topic
